ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectOrder Issuing a Direction to the CRTC on Implementing the Canadian Telecommunications Policy Objectives to Promote Competition, Affordability, Consumer Interests and Innovation
PrecisORDER ISSUING A DIRECTION TO THE CRTC ON IMPLEMENTING THE CANADIAN TELECOMMUNICATIONS POLICY OBJECTIVES TO PROMOTE COMPETITION, AFFORDABILITY, CONSUMER INTERESTS AND INNOVATION in order that the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission considers promotion of competition, affordability, consumers interests and innovation in its decision.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0227 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
